values.value: Provide a clear and accessible mechanism for California consumers to opt out of the sale or sharing of their personal information. CCPA requires a Do Not Sell My Personal Information link on the homepage and a process to honor opt-out requests within 15 business days.

Add a Do Not Sell My Personal Information link to all customer-facing pages and Experience Cloud sites. Build a flow or process to capture opt-out requests and update the Individual object with the consumer's preference. Ensure downstream integrations and third-party data sharing cease within 15 business days of receiving the opt-out request. Implement Global Privacy Control signal recognition to automatically honor browser-based opt-out preferences.
